org.glite.data.hydra.javacli.core
Class HydraConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.glite.data.hydra.javacli.core.HydraConnection

public class HydraConnection
extends java.lang.Object

A class to work as an interface between the Hydra-webservice SOAP-interface and our Java-client.

Author:
ekorhone

HydraConnection

public HydraConnection(java.lang.String address,
                       java.lang.String servername,
                       java.lang.String schema)
Constructor for HydraConnection

Parameters:
address - e.g. "https://vtb-generic-70.cern.ch:8443/3/glite-data-hydra-service/services/Hydra"
servernumber - a number you want to give for this connection
schema - optional schema. Defaults to "eds" if given null

distributeKey

public static void distributeKey(HydraConnection[] connections,
                                 java.lang.Integer reconstruction_threshold,
                                 HydraKey key,
                                 java.io.File filename,
                                 java.lang.String userid)
                          throws org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.AuthorizationException,
                                 org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.NotExistsException,
                                 org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.InvalidArgumentException,
                                 org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.InternalException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                 javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException,
                                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Splits and Distributes a key to a set of Hydra-servers.

Parameters:
connections - - An array of established connections.
reconstruction_threshold - - How many Slices do we need to reconstruct a key
key - - The HydraKey to be stored
filename - - The filename of the file for which we link the encryption key
userid - - A string representing a unique Hydra-Server user. For example, can be derived from the authentication certificate or VOMS virtual organization
Throws:
org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.AuthorizationException
org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.NotExistsException
org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.InvalidArgumentException
org.glite.wsdl.services.org_glite_data_catalog.InternalException
java.rmi.RemoteException
javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

Builds a HydraKey from given connection-endpoints and the metadata regarding filename and user TODO: Tests to make sure that the key reconstructs or does not after service-failures of individual Hydras

Returns:
HydraKey reconstructed
